casebody.data:
IN RE: Bart F. MCCLAIN No. 165P19-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 4, 2019 Bart F. McClain, for McClain, Bart F. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of May 2019 by Petitioner for Emergency Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of June 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 23rd of May 2019 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Scotland County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of June 2019."
